Event Details

On-the-Spot Theme and Tool Announcement: The specific theme and the AI tool to be used will be announced just before the image creation phase.

Round 1:

Participants will brainstorm and create their AI-generated artwork by giving prompts to the tool based on the announced theme.

Round 2:

Teams will be given a new theme and specific constraints for the second round. Team members will work together to brainstorm and create their artwork within the allotted time.

All submissions will be collected for judging, where each entry will be evaluated based on creativity, relevance to the theme, and overall aesthetic quality.

Rules & Regulations

  • Teams must consist of two members. Participants can choose to compete individually or form a team with a partner.
  • Only two teams are allowed per college.
  • Participants should only use the tool provided for image generation. No external resources should be used.
  • Participants will have a total of 20 minutes for each round to create their artwork.

  • Relevance to the theme:
